description: This file contains CSS styles for a web application, specifically theme management and styling for a Tic Tac Toe frontend interface.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application container, including text alignment and background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application, including background color and layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
